content: tiny trees baby vest dk / worsted 0-3mth 41cm / 16 chest circumference a light vintage inspired modern baby vest requirements 5mm 40cm circular double pointed needles or 100cm+ for magic loop needle or size required to obtain gauge approximately 105m of thick dk or worsted yarn skeinz urban rrhy belle olive and emma superwash dk jodulbug dk featherbrush superwash dk cascade 220 on 5mm needles or as required for gauge 4 stitch markers stitch holders or waste yarn darning needle gauge 4 5 stitches per inch fabric should be lightweight if you prefer a thicker fabric use thicker yarn knit at the same 4 5st per inch gauge double check length measurements as provided thicker yarn may require less row abbreviations pm place marker st stitches k knit p purl sm slip marker bobble bind off decrease bind off knit through back loop is recommended see links ws wrong side rs right side sl1p slip 1 purl wise moving yarn between the first and second stitch to the back of the work ssk slip slip knit worked knit wise k2tog knit two together links magic loop http //www youtube com/watch v=btbsmxgompk long tail cast on http //www youtube com/watch v=8wupqdytoy0 decrease bind off http //www youtube com/watch v=lodi0b4qegu kitchener stitch tutorial http //www youtube com/watch v=i7jizwo5nv4 this pattern is for personal use only items made from this pattern may not be sold without the author s permission please contact me if you wish to purchase a cottage licence to make them to sell please do not redistribute this pattern without my permission email me at kylie@eosdesign net nz or message me khai on ravelry for more information huge thanks to my testers and to ryan for inspiring the pattern and modelling the prototype 1 | p age remember to check your gauge bottom trim cast on 78 stitches using a long tail cast on join to work in the round placing a start of round marker if desired the bottom trim is 7 rounds of garter stitch beginning and finishing on a purl round purl one round knit one round work these two rounds 3 times 6 rounds total then work another purl round body work stocking stitch knit every round until work measures 16cm / 6 25 from cast on edge arm holes and splitting front and back round 1 purl 6 underarm pm1 work front 33st in pattern as follows p1 p3 k1 7 times p4 pm2 purl 6 underarm pm3 purl across back 33st pm4 or sorm becomes marker 4 round 2 knit to end of round round 3 p6 sm1 p1 p3 k1 x 7 p4 sm2 p6 sm3 p to end of round round 4 bobble the 6 underarm st remove marker 1 knit front 33st remove marker 2 bobble 6 underarm st remove marker 3 knit back 33st remove marker 4 place front 33st patterned stitches onto a holder or waste yarn the front patterned and back garter stitch are now worked flat
